verses.verse: Therefore, <S%G5620><s%> my beloved <S%G27><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%> whom <S%G1973><s%> I long <S%G1973><s%> [to see], my joy <S%G5479><s%> and crown, <S%G4735><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> stand <S%G4739><s%> firm <S%G4739><s%> in the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> my beloved. <S%G27><s%>
I urge <S%G3870><s%> Euodia <S%G2136><s%> and I urge <S%G3870><s%> Syntyche <S%G4941><s%> to live <S%G5426><s%> in harmony <S%G5426><s%> in the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

Indeed, <S%G3483><s%> true <S%G1103><s%> comrade, <S%G4805><s%> I ask <S%G2065><s%> you also <S%G2532><s%> to help <S%G4815><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> women <S%G846><s%> who <S%G3748><s%> have shared <S%G4866><s%> my struggle <S%G4866><s%> in [the cause of] the gospel, <S%G2098><s%> together <S%G3326><s%> with Clement <S%G2815><s%> also, <S%G2532><s%> and the rest <S%G3062><s%> of my fellow <S%G4904><s%> workers, <S%G4904><s%> whose <S%G3739><s%> names <S%G3686><s%> are in the book <S%G976><s%> of life. <S%G2222><s%>
Rejoice <S%G5463><s%> in the Lord <S%G2962><s%> always; <S%G3842><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> I will say, <S%G3004><s%> rejoice! <S%G5463><s%>
Let your forbearing <S%G1933><s%> [spirit] be known <S%G1097><s%> to all <S%G3956><s%> men. <S%G444><s%> The Lord <S%G2962><s%> is near. <S%G1451><s%>

Be anxious <S%G3309><s%> for nothing, <S%G3367><s%> but in everything <S%G3956><s%> by prayer <S%G4335><s%> and supplication <S%G1162><s%> with thanksgiving <S%G2169><s%> let your requests <S%G155><s%> be made <S%G1107><s%> known <S%G1107><s%> to God. <S%G2316><s%>

And the peace <S%G1515><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> which surpasses <S%G5242><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> comprehension, <S%G3563><s%> shall guard <S%G5432><s%> your hearts <S%G2588><s%> and your minds <S%G3540><s%> in Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

Finally, <S%G3062><s%> brethren, <S%G80><s%> whatever <S%G3745><s%> is true, <S%G227><s%> whatever <S%G3745><s%> is honorable, <S%G4586><s%> whatever <S%G3745><s%> is right, <S%G1342><s%> whatever <S%G3745><s%> is pure, <S%G53><s%> whatever <S%G3745><s%> is lovely, <S%G4375><s%> whatever <S%G3745><s%> is of good <S%G2163><s%> repute, <S%G2163><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> there is any <S%G5100><s%> excellence <S%G703><s%> and if <S%G1487><s%> anything <S%G5100><s%> worthy <S%G1868><s%> of praise, <S%G1868><s%> let your mind <S%G3049><s%> dwell <S%G3049><s%> on these <S%G3778><s%> things. <S%G3778><s%>

The things <S%G3739><s%> you have learned <S%G3129><s%> and received <S%G3880><s%> and heard <S%G191><s%> and seen <S%G3708><s%> in me, practice <S%G4238><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things; <S%G3778><s%> and the God <S%G2316><s%> of peace <S%G1515><s%> shall be with you.

But I rejoiced <S%G5463><s%> in the Lord <S%G2962><s%> greatly, <S%G3171><s%> that now <S%G2235><s%> at last <S%G4218><s%> you have revived <S%G330><s%> your concern <S%G5426><s%> for me; indeed, <S%G2532><s%> you were concerned <S%G5426><s%> [before,] but you lacked <S%G170><s%> opportunity. <S%G170><s%>
Not that I speak <S%G3004><s%> from want; <S%G5304><s%> for I have learned <S%G3129><s%> to be content <S%G842><s%> in whatever <S%G3739><s%> circumstances <S%G1722><s%> I am. <S%G1510><s%>

I know <S%G3609><s%> how <S%G3609><s%> to get <S%G5013><s%> along <S%G5013><s%> with humble <S%G5013><s%> means, <S%G5013><s%> and I also <S%G2532><s%> know <S%G3609><s%> how <S%G3609><s%> to live <S%G4052><s%> in prosperity; <S%G4052><s%> in any <S%G3956><s%> and every <S%G3956><s%> circumstance <S%G1722><s%> I have learned <S%G3453><s%> the secret <S%G3453><s%> of being filled <S%G5526><s%> and going <S%G3983><s%> hungry, <S%G3983><s%> both <S%G2532><s%> of having <S%G4052><s%> abundance <S%G4052><s%> and suffering <S%G5302><s%> need. <S%G5302><s%>
I can <S%G2480><s%> do <S%G2480><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things <S%G3956><s%> through <S%G1722><s%> Him who strengthens <S%G1743><s%> me.
Nevertheless, <S%G4133><s%> you have done <S%G4160><s%> well <S%G2573><s%> to share <S%G4790><s%> [with me] in my affliction. <S%G2347><s%>

And you yourselves <S%G4771><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> know, <S%G3609><s%> Philippians, <S%G5374><s%> that at the first <S%G746><s%> preaching <S%G746><s%> of the gospel, <S%G2098><s%> after <S%G3753><s%> I departed <S%G1831><s%> from Macedonia, <S%G3109><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> church <S%G1577><s%> shared <S%G2841><s%> with me in the matter <S%G3056><s%> of giving <S%G1394><s%> and receiving <S%G3025><s%> but you alone; <S%G3441><s%>
for even <S%G2532><s%> in Thessalonica <S%G2332><s%> you sent <S%G3992><s%> [a gift] more <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1364><s%> than <S%G2532><s%> once <S%G530><s%> for my needs. <S%G5532><s%>
Not that I seek <S%G1934><s%> the gift <S%G1390><s%> itself, but I seek <S%G1934><s%> for the profit <S%G2590><s%> which increases <S%G4121><s%> to your account. <S%G3056><s%>

But I have <S%G568><s%> received <S%G568><s%> everything <S%G3956><s%> in full, <S%G568><s%> and have <S%G4052><s%> an abundance; <S%G4052><s%> I am amply <S%G4137><s%> supplied, <S%G4137><s%> having received <S%G1209><s%> from Epaphroditus <S%G1891><s%> what you have sent, <S%G3844><s%> a fragrant <S%G2175><s%> aroma, <S%G3744><s%> an acceptable <S%G1184><s%> sacrifice, <S%G2378><s%> well-pleasing to God. <S%G2316><s%>

And my God <S%G2316><s%> shall supply <S%G4137><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> your needs <S%G5532><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to His riches <S%G4149><s%> in glory <S%G1391><s%> in Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>
Now <S%G1161><s%> to our God <S%G2316><s%> and Father <S%G3962><s%> [be] the glory <S%G1391><s%> forever <S%G165><s%> and ever. <S%G165><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>
Greet <S%G782><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> saint <S%G40><s%> in Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%> The brethren <S%G80><s%> who are with me greet <S%G782><s%> you.
All <S%G3956><s%> the saints <S%G40><s%> greet <S%G782><s%> you, especially <S%G3122><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> of Caesar's household. <S%G3614><s%>
The grace <S%G5485><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> be with your spirit. <S%G4151><s%>
